message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take it or leave it, I'm the master of negotiation!
I'm willing to give you a better deal, but don't get too comfortable!

I'm not desperate yet, but I'm getting close. Take it or leave it!

I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
You're getting close to the end, and I'm not budging. Take this and save what's left of your dignity!
I'm not going down without a fight! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think I'm done yet!
You're almost out of time, and I'm not getting any more generous. Take it or leave it, it's almost over!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
It's now or never, Alice. Take this and let's be done with it!
